00001 #ifndef SM_COREDATA_EOD_PLATFORM_TYPES_H
00002 #define SM_COREDATA_EOD_PLATFORM_TYPES_H
00004 // Compiler dependent fixed-width integer type definitions
00005 // (The size of an int is machine specific in C++).
00006 
00007 // This is to prevent these from conflicting with foundationlib if used from there.
00008 #ifndef FOUNDATION_BASICS_WINDOWS_H
00009     #ifdef COREDATA_CC_MSVC
00010             typedef unsigned __int64 uint64;
00011             typedef __int64 int64;
00012             typedef unsigned __int32 uint32;
00013             typedef __int32 int32;
00014             typedef unsigned __int16 uint16;
00015             typedef __int16 int16;
00016             typedef __int8 int8;
00017             typedef unsigned __int8 uint8;
00018     #endif
00019 
00020     #ifdef COREDATA_CC_GNU
00021     
00022             #include <sys/types.h>  
00023     
00024             typedef u_int64_t uint64;
00025             typedef int64_t int64;
00026             typedef u_int32_t uint32;
00027             typedef int32_t int32;
00028             typedef u_int16_t uint16;
00029             typedef int16_t int16;
00030             typedef u_int8_t uint8;
00031             typedef int8_t int8;
00032 
00033             typedef unsigned char BYTE;
00034             typedef unsigned long DWORD;
00035     #endif
00036 #endif
00037 
00038 #endif
